DOC.brief_summary: To compare the safety and efficacy of an aliskiren-based regimen to a lisinopril-based regimen in the treatment of severe hypertension
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Study to Compare the Safety and Efficacy of an Aliskiren-based Regimen With a Lisinopril Based Regimen in Patients With Severe Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patients with essential severe hypertension Exclusion Criteria History or evidence of a secondary form of hypertension History of hypertensive encephalopathy or cerebrovascular accident. Diabetic patients requiring insulin Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria also apply
